name: Trello DarkBD
description: Based of Trello Dark and focused on old computers, slow connection or low end video cards.
additional_info:
Version 0.3
+ Fixed slowness when dragging a Card (Thanks to Dev Oscar for the bug report)
+ Added a bit more space between cards to make it easy to drop them

Version 0.2
+ Added Number of Total Cards for Each Trello Project

Version 0.1
+ Bit of Cleanup
